page.title: 15NOTTINGHAM VICTORIA CENTRE
page.content: Victoria Centre is almost in the middle of town.It is named after the Victoria Station which used to be there.A tunnel led from the station through to the Forest, where there was a small station in Carrington which is now a sweetshop.Victoria Centre is a large shopping area where people can do their shopping under one roof rather than walking all over town to do it. Outside the Centre is an old clock tower.It was left there to remind people of the station which was there before.In the Centre are pubs, restaurants, and lots of shops.There is a market which used to be the Central Market in a different part of town before the Centre was built.
